name: Robits (Robits, DeeKay-Spike)
description:
Robits is a 3rd-person puzzle fighting game that teaches coding through cyberpunk robot battles against AI. Build your robots using arms you find, Program your robot to help you as you Fight your way through different programming puzzles.  Can you put your coding logic to the test and survive?

The Robits team is a small 8 person team of indie developers creating innovative new ways to teach programming  in a fun way. Located all throughout California, they are dedicated to improving this unique programming system and helping teach logic to the next generation of young minds.
